Posts.Content: You are very kind, thank you. It is complicated but I have a great mate. Just really disappointed in this site... was such a support five years ago but not any more. Do you have cancer?
Posts.Title: All about face!

Posts.Content: Thank you all for your replies, I greatly appreciate the support. Love to chat to anyone who has DCIS grade low or intermediate and the decisions they made
Posts.Title: All about face!

Posts.Content: I have been supporting my long suffering but fighting husband through bowel cancer for five years. Secondaries in liver, ops, chemo.... injections looming.. prognosis not great...and today I was told I have breast cancer. Anyone else been through this?
Posts.Title: All about face!
